Articles.Content:
In my install (32 bit Mac, It's not a RAM related problem) I have just KW and FAR installed (beside Squad and NASA) and it seems like they don't want to work together.

I'm getting really weird graphics bugs (the whole screen becomes red and green, or appears something like a really big shade on the space center) and game crashes.

Can anyone help me?

Here is where i got the mods

http://kerbal.curseforge.com/ksp-mods/220894-kw-rocketry-v2-6d

https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/52/Ferram%20Aerospace%20Research

Thank you
Is this issue close to what you're seeing? If you can reproduce the graphics issues, I'd appreciate it if you upload your Player.log.

Kinda

I'll post the log tomorrow with a picture

Thank you

Here they are

https://www.dropbox.com/s/7oxgbhaov30yezo/Player.log.zip?dl=0

https://www.dropbox.com/s/uo4o819uoh781gr/IMG_3262.JPG?dl=0

- - - Updated - - -

what i'll try is installing active texture management aggressive and see if that solves it

- - - Updated - - -

active txt mng improved the situation but did not solve it
i am getting the same issue except i use FAR but not KW
